00034 /**
00035  * \file
00036  *         uIP checksum calculation for MSP430
00037  */
00038 
00039 #include "net/uip.h"
00040 
00041 #define asmv(arg) __asm__ __volatile__(arg)
00042 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00043 #ifdef UIP_ARCH_IPCHKSUM
00044 u16_t
00045 uip_ipchksum(void)
00046 {
00047   /* Assumes proper alignement of uip_buf. */
00048   u16_t *p = (u16_t *)&uip_buf[UIP_LLH_LEN];
00049   register u16_t sum;
00050 
00051   sum = p[0];
00052   asmv("add  %[p], %[sum]": [sum] "+r" (sum): [p] "m" (p[1]));
00053   asmv("addc %[p], %[sum]": [sum] "+r" (sum): [p] "m" (p[2]));
00054   asmv("addc %[p], %[sum]": [sum] "+r" (sum): [p] "m" (p[3]));
00055   asmv("addc %[p], %[sum]": [sum] "+r" (sum): [p] "m" (p[4]));
00056   asmv("addc %[p], %[sum]": [sum] "+r" (sum): [p] "m" (p[5]));
00057   asmv("addc %[p], %[sum]": [sum] "+r" (sum): [p] "m" (p[6]));
00058   asmv("addc %[p], %[sum]": [sum] "+r" (sum): [p] "m" (p[7]));
00059   asmv("addc %[p], %[sum]": [sum] "+r" (sum): [p] "m" (p[8]));
00060   asmv("addc %[p], %[sum]": [sum] "+r" (sum): [p] "m" (p[9]));
00061 
00062   /* Finally, add the remaining carry bit. */
00063   asmv("addc #0, %[sum]": [sum] "+r" (sum));
00064 
00065   /* Return sum in network byte order. */
00066   return (sum == 0) ? 0xffff : sum;
00067 }
00068 #endif
00069 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
